game.name: Masseur of Romance
game.shortDescription: This domestic male-oriented dating sim and management game lets you experience a journey blending love and management as a male beautician and physiotherapist. Featuring various fun mini-games, it lets you craft a unique ending through business management and plot choices.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This domestic male-oriented dating sim and management game lets you experience a journey blending love and management as a male beautician and physiotherapist. Featuring various fun mini-games, it lets you craft a unique ending through business management and plot choices.
